bootScreen.pressAnyKey: Press any key or click to start

licenseConfirmation.title: Just making sure...
licenseConfirmation.message: By using ArcOS, you agree to the License Agreement. You may not violate any of the rules contained within this license. Continue?

viewLicense.title: ArcOS License - GPLv3
viewLicense.message: By using ArcOS, you agree to the GPLv3 License contained within

passwordMismatch.title: You made a typo!
passwordMismatch.message: The passwords you entered don't match. Please re-enter them, and then try again.

genericError.title: Something went wrong
genericError.message: An error occured while creating your account. We might be experiencing some technical difficulties, please try again later.

checkAccountActivationError.title: Did you click the link?
checkAccountActivationError.message: Our systems tell me that your account hasn't been activated yet. Are you sure you clicked the link? If you did, and you're still seeing this, please contact support.

checkInbox.title: Check your inbox
checkInbox.subtitle: You've got mail!
checkInbox.message: We sent you a link to activate your account. Open it to continue. Be sure to check your spam if you canâ€™t find it.

finish.title: All finished!
finish.subtitle: You're all set.
finish.message: Your account has been set up successfully. Click Finish to start using ArcOS.

freshDeployment.title: Fresh deployment
freshDeployment.message: It appears this ReArc deployment is fresh. Before continuing, please make sure that that's supposed to be the case. If it is, click Next. The user you're about to create is considered user #0, and will be set up as a God Admin by default. The owner of this account is then automatically seen as the owner of the server. Also, please check the server configuration:
freshDeployment.note: Note: disableRegistration is ignored for the first user. This configuration option will be retained once the first user has been created.

identity.title: Your ArcOS Identity
identity.subtitle: We'll use this information to create your ArcOS account.

errors.usernameAndEmailTaken: Username and email address are both taken!
errors.emailAndUsernameInvalid: Username and email address are both invalid!

identity.disclaimer: * You will receive an email with a link to activate your account. Your display name, username and password can be changed later on. To change your email, contact an administrator.

license.title: License Agreement
license.subtitle: Scary stuff, I know
license.message: By using ArcOS, you agree to the GPLv3 license.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: We're happy to have you
welcome.message: Let's get you an ArcOS account. Click Next to get started, or Cancel to go back to the login screen.

errors.totpInvalid: You didn't enter a valid 2FA code!

header.title: Keyboard shortcuts
header.subtitle: Get more work done faster with these handy shortcuts!

noTargetApp.title: App not found
noTargetApp.message: AppInfo couldn't find any information about "{{0}}". Is it installed?

killAll.what: ArcOS needs your permission to kill all instances of an app

noDistrib.title: Can't install package
noDistrib.message: The Distribution Service isn't running anymore. Please restart ArcOS to fix this problem.

noEnableThirdParty.title: Can't install app
noEnableThirdParty.message: Third-party apps aren't enabled on your account. Please enable third-party apps in the Settings app to install this app.

subtitle.completed: Click Open now to launch the app

noEnableThirdParty.title: Can't install app
noEnableThirdParty.message: Third-party apps aren't enabled on your account. Please enable third-party apps in the Settings app to install this app.

errors.noContents: The package contents could not be read
errors.noMeta: The package metadata could not be read
errors.missingFiles: Package is corrupt; missing package or app metadata.
errors.appIdMalformed: The application ID is malformed: it contains periods or dashes. If you're the creator of the app, be sure to use the suggested format for application IDs.

fail.title: Failed to open package
fail.messagePartial: ArcOS failed to open the specified package.

elevation.what: ArcOS wants to install an application

header.title: Do you want to install this package?

shutdown.caption: Shut down
shutdown.description: Leave the desktop and turn off ArcOS

restart.caption: Restart
restart.description: Leave the desktop and restart ArcOS

logoff.caption: Log off
logoff.description: Leave the desktop and log out of ArcOS

style.subtitle: Pick which style suits you best. You can always change it in the Settings app.

profilePicture.subtitle: Do you want to upload or pick a profile picture?

thirdParty.subtitle: Do you want to be able to install apps made by other ArcOS users? You can always turn it off later if you change your mind.

finish.subtitle: Enjoy using ArcOS! If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to talk about them in the Discord.

ChooseProfilePicture.title: Choose profile picture
ChooseProfilePicture.subtitle: What do you want to be?

FsNewFile.subtitle: Think of a wonderful name for this new file:

FsNewFolder.subtitle: Think of a wonderful name for this new folder:
